reviews.review: If you want to play a game where the devs actually care about the quality of their product you should find another game. This game is borderline unplayable most of the time with the amount of of bugs as well. Overall piece of shit game but im stupid enough to keep playing it.

I fucking hate this game and wish I could be rid of it. Dead by Daylight has ruined my life and traumatised me.

9/10 would recommend.

Fun overall, I love the endless achievement and leveling up. The archives add a missed element to the game and lore. Its just super enjoyable and have only made more friends playing this game.

The game is a lot of fun especially when your willing to drop 5 or 10 bucks on DLC for the game, some of the best DLCs to get are the Silent Hill DLC with Pyramid Head and the Halloween DLC with Michael Myers but if your a Resident Evil fan boy like me the Resident Evil DLC is also very good.

This game can be hella scary
I enjoy the game! Seems kinda hard to join games if you have more than 1 person with you playing it though. I played it on PS4 for a long time and chose to get it on here.
The devs perfected the famous "just walk away from the screen bruh" move anytime they ran into some constructive criticism.

It's a great game to play with friends that you don't mind talking major smack with and having a good time.

However, with that being said, if you are playing with new people or in a random multiplayer match, it lives up to the hype of being terrifying and anxiety-ridden. 

Very good game, for an overall rating I would give this game a good (7.5/10)

Such an awesome game, well designed. Actual game play is very competitive.
Never been the biggest fan of multiplayer, this has so far been an incredibly fun game for casuals and experts! Highly recommend it.

I really enjoy this game, its so much fun playing with my friends as well as showing off to them! However the matchmaking system is so heavily bugged I just wouldn't count on the game being nice no matter what side you play.
